name: Apocryphal (kilian.di_fraja)
description:
Apocryphal est un jeu de puzzle où le but est de passer de

pièce par pièce tout en essayant de découvrir ce qui est arrivé à Kazan et de s'échapper.

This game is a demo created by 4 Brassart student of Montpellier in France 

Kazan wakes up in an unknown place with a disturbing atmosphere,

he doesn't feel alone and he tries to understand who or what's observing him,

so he is thinking about how he is going to leave this place.

Kilian Di Fraja : Programer, UI-UX Design

Arthurn : Sound Design / Composer

Gabriel Gas : Level Design 

Samuel Guibert : Producer

We hope you will enjoy this game.
